clearBitSet

public static final BitSet7 clearBitSet
An empty BitSet7 object. Useful for clearing all outputs without creating new objects.

Convert a BitSet to an unsigned integer.

Returns:
an unsigned integer number.

bitSetToBinaryString

public static String bitSetToBinaryString(BitSet7 b,
                                          int startBit,
                                          int length)
Convert a BitSet to a binary representation string. Each bit is converted into "0" or "1" and added to the string. The result is a binary number with its most significant bit on the left.

Parameters:
b - BitSet to convert
startBit - Start converting from this bit. Treat it as the least significant bit.
length - Number of bits to read from the BitSet after the startBit.

bitSetToBinaryString

public static String bitSetToBinaryString(BitSet7 b,
                                          int startBit,
                                          int length,
                                          int wordlength)
Convert a BitSet to a binary representation string. Converting each bit into "0" or "1". The result is a binary number with its most significant bit on the left.

Parameters:
b - BitSet to convert
startBit - Start converting from this bit. Treat it as the least significant bit.
length - Number of bits to read from the BitSet after the startBit.
wordlength - When greater than 0, a space character is added each wordlength number of digits.
Returns:
Binary representation String of the BitSet.

bitSetToString

public static String bitSetToString(BitSet7 bits,
                                    int length)
Converts a BitSet to String

Parameters:
bits -
length -
Returns:

stringToBitSet

public static BitSet7 stringToBitSet(String sbits)
Converts a string into a BitSet. The first character is the most significant bit. a '1' character is converted to true. Every other character is converted to false.

Parameters:
sbits - The string to convert.

shiftLeft

public static BitSet7 shiftLeft(BitSet7 s,
                                int length)
Shifts bits of a BitSet object one place to the left. Stores new value in the same BitSet.

Parameters:
s - Shifted BitSet object.
length - Length of binary number.
Returns:
BitSet s after shifting.

shiftRight

public static BitSet7 shiftRight(BitSet7 s,
                                 int length,
                                 boolean logical)
Shifts bits of a BitSet object one place to the right. Stores new value in the same BitSet.

Parameters:
s - Shifted BitSet object.
length - Length of binary number.
logical - true for logical right shift; false for arithmetic right shift.
Returns:
BitSet s after shifting.

intToBitSet

public static BitSet7 intToBitSet(int value,
                                  int length)
Stores an integer number in a BitSet object.

Parameters:
value - integer number to store
length - number of bits to use.
Returns:

bitSetToMap

public static Map<String,String> bitSetToMap(Map<String,String> map,
                                             String key,
                                             BitSet7 bits,
                                             int length)
Stores a BitSet object as a string in a map. Used for state persistence. Basically converts the BitSet into a string of "1" and "0" according to its bit values.

Parameters:
map - A Map object to store the bit set in.
key - The map key in which to store the bit set.
bits - The bit set that will be stored in the map.
length - Number of bits to store.
Returns:
The same map object as the parameter.

mapToBitSet

public static BitSet7 mapToBitSet(Map<String,String> map,
                                  String key)
Parses a string representation of a BitSet into a BitSet7 object. Used for loading circuit state from file.

Parameters:
map - The map to read the BitSet string from.
key - The map key that points to the BitSet string.
Returns:
The parsed BitSet7 object.

boolToBitSet

public static BitSet7 boolToBitSet(boolean[] bits,
                                   int offset,
                                   int length)
Converts a boolean array into a BitSet

Parameters:
bits - Boolean array to convert.
offset - Array index to start reading from.
length - Number of bits to convert.
Returns:
